Permissions

This is where you edit system access for team members.

Admin’s can:

  • See all facilities in the portfolio
  • Remove facilities
  • Invite team members
  • Grant others admin privileges
  • Do everything Managers can do

Manager's can:

  • Invite people to their facilities
  • Decide which members view which facilities
  • Remove team members
